NK103(pe)003:1: // sa ma ya s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ////
NK103(pe)003:4: sa ma yarat+na tat+t+wasarba d+harmaya hinan+aa ma /
NK103(pe)003:6: gnas lugs skyon grol dam pa'i don la gnas na
NK103(pe)003:7: kun brtags 'gal na rang rgyud tshigdgos 'dod 'byung bas
NK103(pe)003:8: rin po chema nor bas de kho na nyid du'khor
NK103(pe)003:9: 'das kyi chos thams cadrang gi ngo bos nges pazhes
NK103(pe)003:10: bya ba // rang bzhin bcom rnam par ldan mtshan
NK103(pe)003:11: nyid 'das gzhi ji bzhin nyid la nyes skyon ye
NK103(pe)003:12: nas rnam par dag par lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang
NK103(pe)003:14: byed pa po med pas rang bzhin gyis ye nas
NK103(pe)003:15: lhun gyis grub pas rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal med pas
NK103(pe)003:16: bde chen yul med rang gsal du gnas pa las
NK103(pe)003:17: // de ltar mi shes pa sgyu ma 'khrul pa'i blo yis rang gi rgyud bcings pa //
NK103(pe)003:18: de las grol bar mdzad pa'i ston pa bcom ldan
NK103(pe)003:19: 'das gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag rdo rje 'chang la
NK103(pe)003:20: // rang la gnas pa gzhi dang de rtogs pa
NK103(pe)003:21: lta ba dang goms pa ting nge dang mthar phyin
NK103(pe)003:22: 'bras bu dang bzhi'i ngang du phyag 'tshal //
NK103(pe)003:23: byang chub sems lhun grub gsum po nyid nyes skyon
NK103(pe)003:24: rnam par dag par ye nas gnas pa las rtogs
NK103(pe)003:26: bas gnas lugs ma rtogs pa lhan skyes nga med pa la nga bdag tu brtags pas kun brtags /
NK103(pe)003:27: des gzhan du snang ba las gzung 'dzin dug lnga rgyas //
NK103(pe)003:28: de ltar 'khrul zhing khams gsum du 'khor de sdug
NK103(pe)003:29: bsngal gsum sogs nyams su myong ba de bsal ba'i
NK103(pe)003:30: thabs lam la brten nas bsod nams la 'bad btsal
NK103(pe)003:31: byas kyang // sems nyid rnam par dag pa dam
NK103(pe)003:32: pa'i don de las 'das na 'bras bu'i gzhi rten
NK103(pe)003:33: med par 'gyur bas de bsrung ba'i thabs rnam par
NK103(pe)003:35: dam tshig bsrungs na che ba'i yon tan 'byung bas yid bzhin rin po che dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)003:36: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol tu sgrol ba'i phyir gru dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)003:37: thub ma thub la nyes legs chen po 'byung bas
NK103(pe)003:38: so mtshams kyi mkhar chen dang 'dra ngan song gi
NK103(pe)003:40: nad 1las dang mu ge 1 las mtshon 1las skyob 111pa'i //
NK103(pe)003:42: ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal las 'dren pa lcags kyu'i mchog
NK103(pe)003:43: /'khor ba las thar pa dang mthar thug bde ba
NK103(pe)003:44: chen pa'i srog chen po yin pas //
NK103(pe)003:45: gzhi dad pa grogs brtson 'grus brtse gdung dam tshig dang ldan pas nan tan bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:46: dam tshig 'di dang bran na rnal chos can 'byor bka' rgyud mkhas brtson kyang //
NK103(pe)003:47: thar pa dang bde ba chen po thob pa'i gnas min dam bca' te //
NK103(pe)003:48: gzhi he tuh 'gram rten dang bral ba'i phyir //
NK103(pe)003:49: dper na mkha' la ri mor brir sems kyang mi btub pa bzhin no //
NK103(pe)003:50: gzhi rnam dag lhun grub gang yin dam tshig rnam gnyis kyi ngo bo ji lta bu //
NK103(pe)003:51: tshig don 'brel legs kyi nges tshig dang blo dang
NK103(pe)003:52: 'tsham pa'i dbye ba dang nyams pa mi 'byung ba'i
NK103(pe)003:53: gdeng dang / bsrung du med pa'i srog dang //
NK103(pe)003:54: thun mong khyad par gyi yon tan dang mthar mi phyin pa'i /
NK103(pe)003:55: skyon dang rtogs la goms pas bsrung ba'i thabs dang //
NK103(pe)003:56: de ltar bsrungs pa yi 'bras bu gang du nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:57: rang bzhin byang rnam pa chub sems mtshan nyid nyid rnam par dag /
NK103(pe)003:58: dus ye nas rang la lhun gyis grub cing rdzogs pas na //
NK103(pe)003:59: rang bzhin gyis dag pa de'i ngang la gnas pa'ang rnam par dag pa yin //
NK103(pe)003:60: de lta min na gzhi nyid dri mar bcas par 'gyur bas so //
NK103(pe)003:61: dam tshig ces su ngag tu rjod pa de yang //
NK103(pe)003:62: dngos po yod par kun tu brtags rtsol bral pa'i chos kyi blo lung man ngag gis bkrol nas //
NK103(pe)003:63: rtogs pa'i don la gnas pa dang rang 'dod dang mthun lhag spyod pa'i phyogs su //
NK103(pe)003:64: sgo gsum 1 lus ngag yid gsum /
NK103(pe)003:65: 'og ma'i gzhung gi 'dul sdom dam gyi rtsa ba dang yan lag 1bsdam mo //
NK103(pe)003:66: gnas lugs 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las grol ba dam pa'i don //
NK103(pe)003:67: de rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas kun brtags 'khrul pa 'tshig /
NK103(pe)003:68: de las log ste mi gnas pas rang gi rgyud duhkhasa 'tshig /
NK103(pe)003:69: des na tshig don 'brel legs pa ni nges pa'i tshig tu brjod do //
NK103(pe)003:70: dam tshig de yang gang zag blo'i rim pa yis tha dad de //
NK103(pe)003:71: rtogs pa'i gdeng dang ldan pas lhag pa'i spyod par
NK103(pe)003:72: 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig grangs la btab ste
NK103(pe)003:73: bsrung ba dang // bsrung bya srung byed kyi rtsol
NK103(pe)003:74: ba dang bral ba rang rig pa'i dam tshig dang
NK103(pe)003:75: bsrung ba dang // // rnam grangs gnyis su gsang bdag rgyal bas rgyud du gsung so //
NK103(pe)003:76: lhag spyod de yang don la shed ma bye bas byis pa nyan thos pa'i 'dul ba dang //
NK103(pe)003:77: lta spyod nar ru son pa byang chub sems dpa' yi sdom pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:78: rig pa 'dzin pas sngags phyi nang gi dam tshig la gnas //
NK103(pe)003:79: 'jig rten pa so so skye bo la tha 1
NK103(pe)003:80: mi chos kyi tshig 1chad pa la btsan 11par bya
NK103(pe)003:81: ba // de yang 'jig rten 'dir 'tsho bar byed pas //
NK103(pe)003:82: phyi mar rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu duhkha drag po 'byung ba'i log pa'i 'tsho ba bsrung //
NK103(pe)003:83: 'jig rten pa'i bya ba ma yin pa'i yul chos thams cad spang //
NK103(pe)003:84: dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas dang spyod lam spang //
NK103(pe)003:85: gan'i gal chen po dor nas slar mi bza' mi zlog /
NK103(pe)003:88: yid gsum gyi dge ba bcu spyad pa dang sdig pa bcu spang pa 1la //
NK103(pe)003:89: phral tshe 'dir bde zhing dus yun du phan pas dam 1par bsrung //
NK103(pe)003:90: lnga tshan gnyis la bcu dang drug gis mi chos kyi gzhung bsrang bar bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:91: rang gcig pu'i don bya ba'i sems skyes nas dal ba brgyad 'byor pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rten //
NK103(pe)003:92: lha mi'i gnas mtho dman gyi khyad par bsgrub pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)003:93: dge ba gso zhing sdig pa sbyong bar byed pa ni bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa ste /
NK103(pe)003:99: dang dge bsnyen gyi gtan khrims rtsa ba bzhi chang dang lnga //
NK103(pe)003:100: dge tshul gyi slob dpon las thob pa bcu ni
NK103(pe)003:101: gar sogs phreng sogs so sor bgrangs gser dngul la
NK103(pe)003:102: mi reg pa'o // mkhan po las thob pa gsum ni khyim pa'i rtags spong ba /
NK103(pe)003:103: rab tu byung ba'i rtags len pa /
NK103(pe)003:104: mkhan po la mkhan por gsol ba gdab pa ste /
NK103(pe)003:105: de dag gi ngang la gnas shing //
NK103(pe)003:106: dge slong gi bsnyen pa rdzogs nas khrims nyis brgya dang //
NK103(pe)003:111: ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa dgu bcu /
NK103(pe)003:113: bslab bya brgya dang bcu gnyis de dag dam par bsrung ba sgo gsum 'dul ba'i gzhung yin //
NK103(pe)003:116: spang ltung sum cu rtsa gsum /
NK103(pe)003:117: ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa brgya dang brgyad cu /
NK103(pe)003:118: so sor bshags pa bcu gcig /
NK103(pe)003:119: bslab bya brgya dang bcu gnyis te sum brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang //
NK103(pe)003:120: bslab pa bar dge slob mas mthun pa'i chos drug /
NK103(pe)003:121: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug ste nyer lnga bsrung bas bsdus te khrims la gnas par bya //
NK103(pe)003:122: grangs de dag kun yang rtsa ba bzhi srog gcod /
NK103(pe)003:126: rigs brgyad po'i bye brag kun kyang 'da' bar bya ba ni min la //
NK103(pe)003:127: 0de yi bsrung thabs rtsa ba ni //
NK103(pe)003:129: dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba'i ltung ba gang yin gang las skye //
NK103(pe)003:130: gang ltar bcas pa ji ltar 'byung //
NK103(pe)003:131: rten gyi gang zag de bslab pa thob pa la ma nyams par gnas pas //
NK103(pe)003:132: shes pa gdon la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis ma bslad
NK103(pe)003:133: pa srog gcod pa lta bu gcig la sbyar na
NK103(pe)003:134: // gsad gzhi'i bye brag la 1ma 'khrul cing spyir mi tsam du 'du shes pa //
NK103(pe)003:135: kun slong gsad pa'i bsam pas dgra gang yang rung ba la dus nye bar brtsams nas //
NK103(pe)003:136: sbyor bas de la 1mtshon pa la sogs pa myur bas bsnun pa'i rkyen gyis //
NK103(pe)003:137: mthar thug ni srog gi dbang po 'gags te 'du shes ma log na //
NK103(pe)003:138: ltung ba'i dngos gzhi de la babs pa yin te //
NK103(pe)003:139: de yi yan lag tshogs na sdom pa btang bar 'gyur te /
NK103(pe)003:141: ma tshogs na sbyor ba'i ltung ba ste //
NK103(pe)003:142: mi ma yin pa bsad pa dang /
NK103(pe)003:145: sbyor ba byas nas ma shi ba la 'gyod pa skyes pa rnams /
NK103(pe)003:146: bshags pa bya ba'i nyes byas dang yid kyis gsad par 'dod pa ni bsdam bya ste gnyis yod //
NK103(pe)003:147: de yang rgyu dus su nyes pa'i spyod pa bshad pa ltar so sor bsdams pa de yis //
NK103(pe)003:148: 'bras bu'i dus na rnam nges tshig smin so so las thar 1pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:149: 1de yi dbye ba bsnyen gnas bor bas rigs bdun du gnas rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no //
NK103(pe)003:150: gang ltar bcas pa ni rnam par smin pa gleng gzhi so so las grags pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:151: khrims dang ldan pa las cho ga blangs te bsrung
NK103(pe)003:152: ba'i thabs dang gtong ba'i rgyu dang gtong ba'i dus
NK103(pe)003:153: dang // gtong rgyus btang ba'i nyes pa dang ma btang bar gnas pa'i phan yon no //
NK103(pe)003:154: gnas 'dir gang zag 'di la nyes pa 'di byung
NK103(pe)003:155: ba la brten nas bslab pa'i gzhi 'di bcas pa'i
NK103(pe)003:156: gleng gzhi rtsa ba bzhi la sogs pa so sor
NK103(pe)003:157: 'dul ba lung las grags pa bzhin ste //
NK103(pe)003:158: tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i mkhan po chos tshang bas dam pa las //
NK103(pe)003:159: blang ste de yang sngon 'gro sbyor ba'i cho ga
NK103(pe)003:160: rdzogs shing dngos gzhi sdom pa thob par 'dod pa'i
NK103(pe)003:161: mkhan bus // cho ga'i mjug tshang zhing rdzogs pa ni sdom pa thob pa'i rgyu //
NK103(pe)003:162: yin te lan gsum rjes su brjod pa'i cha mtha' ma las thob par nges pa yin no //
NK103(pe)003:163: thob pa de rtsa ba nas gtong ba dang nyes pas nyams 1pa'i 1rgyu 1bsrung ba ni //
NK103(pe)003:164: rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnam pa gnyis bsrung ste //
NK103(pe)003:165: yid dang lhan cig skyes pa sngon du 'gro ba shes bzhin gyi bya ra ba dang //
NK103(pe)003:166: dran pa'i thag pa'i sgo nas ci nus pas bsrung ngo //
NK103(pe)003:167: gtong ba'i rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis bsrung bar ma nus pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:168: 'di bsrungs kyang 'bras bu med snyam ste log lta skyes ba dang ltung ba byung ba'o //
NK103(pe)003:169: gtong dus ni mtshan mo 'das pa'i tshe gtong ste blangs pa'i dus chad pas so //
NK103(pe)003:170: dang rten bor bas shi 'phos 1pa'i dang //
NK103(pe)003:171: sdom pa dang 'gal ba'i rig byed skyed pas /
NK103(pe)003:172: mi brda' 'phrod pa'i drung du bslab pa phul 1ba'i
NK103(pe)003:173: dang dge ba'i gzhi chad pas log lta gnyis bshad
NK103(pe)003:174: kyang rgyu dus gnyis su phye bas zlos skyon med
NK103(pe)003:175: do // skyes pa'i rten nyams pas mtshan gnyis 1gcig
NK103(pe)003:176: char du byung ba'i 1111tshe so so thar pa'i sdom
NK103(pe)003:178: rgyus btang ba'i nyes pa ni rang bzhin gyis ma nus pas btang na //
NK103(pe)003:179: bsrungs kyang phan yon mi 'byung ste nyes pa chung log lta dang //
NK103(pe)003:180: pham pa byung bas btang na ngan song gi 'gro bar 'agro'o //
NK103(pe)003:181: sdom pa la gnas na phan yon ni dkar po'i las thams cad kyi rgyur gnas pas //
NK103(pe)003:182: mu stegs la sogs pa gzhan gyi sbyor ba ngan
NK103(pe)003:183: pas mi tshugs slar kho rang la ldog pa dang
NK103(pe)003:184: // nyes spyod mi dge ba dag pas ngan song gi 'gro ba gsum spangs //
NK103(pe)003:185: rgyal ba sras byang sems dang bcas pas sras ltar du dgongs pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:186: 'bras bur gnas pas mi khom pa'i gnas brgyad ni /
NK103(pe)003:187: dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro dang //
NK103(pe)003:188: kla klo tshe ring lha dang ni //
NK103(pe)003:189: log lta sangs rgyas kyis stong pa //
NK103(pe)003:190: lkugs pa 'di ni mi khom brgyad //
NK103(pe)003:192: nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhir nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:193: de ltar bcas pa las ji ltar mthar dbyung ba
NK103(pe)003:194: ni sngar bshad pa bzhin bag yod pas bslab pa'i
NK103(pe)003:195: gzhi bca' ste // len dus su sngar gyi las
NK103(pe)003:196: ngan bshags par bya la khrims ldan gyi mkhan slob
NK103(pe)003:197: dam pa de la bslab pa blang //
NK103(pe)003:198: dge ba gso ba dang sdig pa sbyong ba'i thabs la sgo gsum 'bad pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:199: gnyen po'i stobs bzang na theg chen gyen du spar //
NK103(pe)003:200: a tis 'dul ba'i dus la bab na rtsol ba'i duhkha las dbugs chen po dbyung ngo //
NK103(pe)003:201: theg pa nar son pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' yi sdom pa ni //
NK103(pe)003:202: slang blang dmigs pa'i ngo bo dang ming don nges
NK103(pe)003:203: pa'i tshig dang grangs kyi dbye ba dang thob pa'i
NK103(pe)003:204: rgyu dang // mi nyams par bsrung ba'i thabs dang
NK103(pe)003:205: sdom pa mi gnas par gtong ba'i rgyu dang bsrungs
NK103(pe)003:206: pa'i phan yon dang ma bsrungs pa'i skyon no //
NK103(pe)003:207: spang bya'i ngo bo ni sdom pa dang mi mthun
NK103(pe)003:208: ba'i phyogs chen po sdom pa nyi shu nas 'byung
NK103(pe)003:210: pa ni sems can la blang bya gnod pa sel
NK103(pe)003:211: dwang du blang bya ni phan pa rgya chen po
NK103(pe)003:212: sgrub // pa yang smon pa ni 'bras bu byang
NK103(pe)003:213: chub la dmigs nas 'jug pa ni 'gro ba'i don
NK103(pe)003:214: sgrub // la dmigs pa'o // 'bras bu byang chub
NK103(pe)003:215: yongs su tshol ba dang ni sems can yongs su
NK103(pe)003:216: sgrub // la dmigs pa'o // smin pa la //
NK103(pe)003:217: dmigs nas nyes pa mi mthun pa sdom zhing phan
NK103(pe)003:218: pa sgrub pa la legs par gnas pas sdom pa'o
NK103(pe)003:219: sgrub // la dmigs pa'o // smin pa la //
NK103(pe)003:220: // nyes spyod sdom 1pa'i dge ba'i chos sdud 1kyi
NK103(pe)003:221: sgrub // la dmigs pa'o // smin pa la //
NK103(pe)003:222: // dang // rang brtan pa thob nas dngos dang
NK103(pe)003:223: brgyud pa'i sgo nas sems can don byed kyi 11tshul
NK103(pe)003:224: khrims dang rnam pa gsum mo //
NK103(pe)003:225: bdag med gnyis rtogs kyi shes rab chen pos sems can gzhan gyi don du sems bskyed nas //
NK103(pe)003:226: gzung ba rdul phran dang 'dzin pa skad cig dang bral bas sems can gzhan la thugs rje che //
NK103(pe)003:227: bas sems bskyed kyi gtso bo ru gzhan don la
NK103(pe)003:228: mos pa'i dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba
NK103(pe)003:229: dang / blang ba'i yul lam rten bla ma bzang
NK103(pe)003:230: pos cho ga'i sbyor dngos rjes gsum rdzogs pa'i tshe
NK103(pe)003:232: sdom pa de dag mi nyams par bsrung bar bya ba'i thabs bstan pa ni //
NK103(pe)003:233: sdom pa nyi shu pa las /
NK103(pe)003:234: rnyed dang bkur sti chags pa yis //
NK103(pe)003:235: bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:236: sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa la //
NK103(pe)003:237: ser snas chos nor mi ster dang //
NK103(pe)003:238: gzhan gyis bshags kyang mi nyan par //
NK103(pe)003:239: khros pas gzhan la 'tshog pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:240: theg pa chen po spong byed cing //
NK103(pe)003:242: zhes pa bzhi po'i kun nas dkris pa chen po ni pham pa dang /
NK103(pe)003:244: kun nas dkris pa chung ngu ni nyes 0byas dang gsum las //
NK103(pe)003:245: brtags te 'dris pa'i dngos po nyid mi brjod pa'i
NK103(pe)003:246: dran pa dang sgo gsum gyi spyod pa la shes
NK103(pe)003:247: bzhin gyi // zin pas spang bya dang gnyen po'i
NK103(pe)003:248: chos rnams la bag yod par ni gsum bsdam 0
NK103(pe)003:249: bzhin gyi // par bya'o // rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK103(pe)003:250: tu smon pa'i sems yongs su btang ste thugs rje'i
NK103(pe)003:253: mdor bsdu na gnyis kho nas byang chub sems dpa'i
NK103(pe)003:254: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa
NK103(pe)003:256: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa yongs su btang ba dang /
NK103(pe)003:257: pham pa'i gnas lta ba'i chos kyi kun nas dkris pa chen po kun du spyod pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:258: phas pham pa lta bu spyad pas ni sdom pa gtong ba'i rgyu gnyis yin la /
NK103(pe)003:259: dus chad pas mi gtong ste //
NK103(pe)003:260: cis na len pa'i tshe snying po byang chub sangs rgyas las //
NK103(pe)003:261: sems can kun kyang mchis kyi bar du sdom pa len pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:262: bsrungs pa'i phan yon so so thar pa'i rjes su
NK103(pe)003:263: rgyu dang 'bras bu la gnas pa mthun pa las
NK103(pe)003:264: // gzhan yang byang chub mchog tu sems gtso ru
NK103(pe)003:265: gzhan don du bskyed pa dang dkon mchog gsum la
NK103(pe)003:267: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rgya mtsho zab cing rgya
NK103(pe)003:268: che ba'i gzhir gyur pa'i yon tan yod pas na
NK103(pe)003:269: // byang chub kyi sems smon 'jug rnam pa gnyis la gnas par bya zhes gdams pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:270: ma bsrungs pa'i nyes pa'ang so so thar pa'i 'dul
NK103(pe)003:271: ba de bzhin du ngan song du 'gro ba dang
NK103(pe)003:272: yon tan de las kyang bzlog pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:273: byang chub kyi sa bon sems bskyed dang bral ba las rkyen bsod nams gzhan rdzogs kyang //
NK103(pe)003:274: myu gu lam gyis rtogs pa dang 'bras bu sangs
NK103(pe)003:275: rgyas rgyun chad du 'gyur ba'i skyon yod pas na
NK103(pe)003:276: // tshul lam thabs ci nas kyang sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o zhes gdams so //
NK103(pe)003:277: rig pa sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'dzin pa sngags la
NK103(pe)003:278: phyi rgyud gsum nang pa ma h+aa gsang ba a
NK103(pe)003:279: ti'o // lus ngag gi bya ba gtsor byed pa dang nang rnal 'byor gtsor byed pa dang /
NK103(pe)003:280: bya ba ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyis 'grub par su 'dod pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:281: byed pas bsrung bya'i ngo bo sgra bshad kyi nges tshig rnam grangs kyi dbye ba /
NK103(pe)003:282: mi nyams par bsrung ba'i thabs ma bsrungs pa'i skyon
NK103(pe)003:283: bsrungs pa'i yon tan rnams mang po'i sgra su lus
NK103(pe)003:284: gnas so // don dam dag pa'i ye shes kun
NK103(pe)003:285: rdzob tu sku bder gshegs gsung pad+ma thugs rdo rje
NK103(pe)003:286: gsum du mtho 'jam rtsub sgo gsum dug gsum rnams
NK103(pe)003:287: gnas so // gnas pa la // dam par bzung
NK103(pe)003:288: ste de rigs gsum du shes rab kyi brtags pa
NK103(pe)003:289: gnas so // gnas pa la // la // byang
NK103(pe)003:290: sems gnyis po de las 'gal bar gyur cing dam
NK103(pe)003:292: sgo gsum gyis bsrung byar rgyud las gang gsungs pa de'o //
NK103(pe)003:293: don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems rnam pa gnyis ni dam pa'i 0don //
NK103(pe)003:295: de la blo 0gnas 1na de las 'gal 1na rnam
NK103(pe)003:298: sgo nas nges pa'i tshig tu brjod do //
NK103(pe)003:299: sangs rgyas pa spyi'i dam tshig dang kri ya ba
NK103(pe)003:300: khyad par gyi dang lhag pa lha'i dam tshig dang
NK103(pe)003:301: gsum ste // rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnam pa gnyis las //
NK103(pe)003:302: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgor zhugs pa spyi yis ldog par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:303: khyad par gyi dam tshig lnga tshan gnyis bcu dang
NK103(pe)003:304: gsum du gsang ba spyi rgyud las rtsa ba'i dam
NK103(pe)003:305: tshig bcu gsum gsungs pa ste //
NK103(pe)003:306: gsum po dkon mchog rin chen la dad pa brtan pa bya ba dang gcig /
NK103(pe)003:307: rtag tu phyag rgya chen po yi dam gyi rig
NK103(pe)003:308: sngags gsang sngags dkyil 'khor gyi lha 1la lhag par
NK103(pe)003:309: la mos pa dang gnyis dad 1par bya ba dang
NK103(pe)003:310: gsum // bla ma dam tshig can dang mdza' bo'i
NK103(pe)003:311: mched la gus par bya ba dang bzhi shing byams
NK103(pe)003:313: lha rnams la mi sdang bar gus par bya ba'i
NK103(pe)003:314: phyir sme ba mi gtsang ba spang bar bya ba
NK103(pe)003:315: dang drug / lha ye shes sems dpa' rje bor
NK103(pe)003:316: dmigs la 'bags brtsog med par gtsang mas dus mtshams
NK103(pe)003:317: su mchod par bya ba dang bdun //
NK103(pe)003:318: log lta'i sdig can mu stegs kyi ston pa gzhan gyi gzhung mi bsten pa dang brgyad //
NK103(pe)003:319: srog chags rnams la snying rje'i thag pa rtag tu rgyun mi gcod pa dang dgu //
NK103(pe)003:320: yang na gong la sbyar ba /
NK103(pe)003:327: bya ba drug la gnas te theg pa la dga' ba /
NK103(pe)003:328: te bzlas brjod la 'bad pa yis bsod nams la nan tan bskyed pa dang bcu //
NK103(pe)003:329: gtso ru gsang sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyi spyod pa
NK103(pe)003:330: la brtson par gnas pa dang bcu gcig pa dang
NK103(pe)003:331: / dam tshig med pa rnams spang zhing sngags rgya
NK103(pe)003:332: mi sbyin pa dang bcu gnyis bka' rgyud kyi don
NK103(pe)003:333: bsrung zhing brtag pa la bdag gis rtogs par bya
NK103(pe)003:335: lhag par'i dam tshig ni dngos po'i gnas lugs rigs gsum gtso bor bzhag ste //
NK103(pe)003:336: byang chub sems gang rdo rje ste /
NK103(pe)003:337: shes rab dril bu'i zhes su brjod /
NK103(pe)003:338: ces pa de gnyis kyi phyag rgya dang //
NK103(pe)003:339: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i bla ma dang gnyis thugs rdo rje'i rigs la bsten cing gnas so //
NK103(pe)003:340: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum gsung bsgrags pa //
NK103(pe)003:341: ste phyi nang gi yan lag gnyis /
NK103(pe)003:342: gsung pad+ma can gyi rigs la gnas pas dam chos bsten no //
NK103(pe)003:343: dkon mchog rin chen gsum gzung ba dang /
NK103(pe)003:344: sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang bzhi ni //
NK103(pe)003:345: sku yi bde gshegs kyi rigs sgrub pa yin no //
NK103(pe)003:346: gang rigs gsum du gnas na mtho ba sku 'jam
NK103(pe)003:347: pa gsung rtsub pa thugs dang nang gi dngos po
NK103(pe)003:348: sgo lus k+aa ngag w+aa yid tsi gsum dang //
NK103(pe)003:349: nyon mongs pa dug gsum gyi sku gti gsung 'dod
NK103(pe)003:350: thugs zhe kyi rigs su gnas par shes par bya'o
NK103(pe)003:351: // dam tshig de'i bsrung thabs don la mi 'gal bar gnas par bya ba ste //
NK103(pe)003:352: 'dir lus mdo tsam smos kyi bsrung thabs yan lag rgyas pa dang //
NK103(pe)003:353: bcas par nga ya rang gi gzhung bzhin du bsrungs te dam la gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:354: ma bsrungs pa'i skyon dang bsrungs pa'i yon tan rgyu
NK103(pe)003:355: yi theg pa'i 'dul sdom gyi rjes su mthun pa
NK103(pe)003:357: rgyal ba'i bka' spangs pa yin pas rdo rje dmyal ba'i khab //
NK103(pe)003:358: tu lhung nas sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong ngo //
NK103(pe)003:359: skyon de las bzlog pa'i yon tan 'og ma bas khyad par du 'phags //
NK103(pe)003:360: pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa dang spyod
NK103(pe)003:361: pa dam la gnas na 'bad rtsol med pas lhun
NK103(pe)003:362: grub pa // yon tan gyi grangs mtha' rgyal bas kyang brjod las 'das par rgyud las gsungs so //
NK103(pe)003:363: bya ba ting 'dzin gnyis kyi dbang gis 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i dam tshig kyang //
NK103(pe)003:364: ngo bo la sogs pa lnga dang dbye ba'ang spyi
NK103(pe)003:365: dang khyad par gyi dam tshig bya ba'i rjes su
NK103(pe)003:366: mthun pa las // lhag pa'i dam tshig ni lhar rigs bzhir dngos po rnams gnas pa ste //
NK103(pe)003:367: de yang rigs lnga la yul sku dang nyid yul
NK103(pe)003:368: can thugs sam bya ba yon tan nyid dang byed
NK103(pe)003:369: pa las sam // gang yang rung ba gcig tu bsdus pa las //
NK103(pe)003:370: lha rigs bzhi bsgrub pa ni rnal 'byor gyi gzhung yin no //
NK103(pe)003:371: rnal 'byor gzhung gi srung byed dam tshig gi ngo bo yang //
NK103(pe)003:372: bya ba'i rjes su mthun pa las lha rigs lnga'i
NK103(pe)003:373: ngo bor 'brel pa la dam par bzung ba yin
NK103(pe)003:374: no // dam tshig gi ming don nges pa'i tshig
NK103(pe)003:375: kyang rjes su mthun pa ni ngo bo de bzhin
NK103(pe)003:376: no // no // spyi yi dam tshig ni sangs rgyas pa kun gyi bsrung bya'i don no //
NK103(pe)003:377: khyad par gyi dam tshig bdun du gsungs par mngon te /
NK103(pe)003:379: dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang //
NK103(pe)003:380: dus kun tu ni byang chub sems //
NK103(pe)003:381: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
NK103(pe)003:382: lha dang bla ma de bzhin no //
NK103(pe)003:383: rdo rje mched dang gsang ba mi bsgrag pa'i dam tshig kyang logs su bstan gsung ngo //
NK103(pe)003:384: gsum dang byang chub kyi sems mi spang ba dang sngags dang //
NK103(pe)003:385: snying po dang phyag rgya chen po yid dam pa'i lha dang //
NK103(pe)003:387: gsang ba'i don gzhan la bsgrags pa min pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:388: lhag pa'i dam tshig ni gnas lugs kyi don la
NK103(pe)003:389: gnas de lha rigs lnga la dpal rdo rje rtse
NK103(pe)003:390: mo las rtsa ltung bcu bzhi gsungs ste //
NK103(pe)003:391: bya ba dang rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin gsum rjes rin chen rigs la //
NK103(pe)003:395: chos sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin tshim par
NK103(pe)003:396: bya ste nyin re re la dus gsum mam lan
NK103(pe)003:397: drug tu du sbyin te yan lag bzhis so //
NK103(pe)003:398: las kyi rigs la sdom pa thams cad kun ldan cing rdzogs pa ni /
NK103(pe)003:399: sems can kun don bya ba dang //
NK103(pe)003:400: mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus bya //
NK103(pe)003:401: zhes pas yan lag gnyis so //
NK103(pe)003:402: lhag par mchod pa'i las bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:403: phung po lnga 'byung ba lnga nyon mongs lnga //
NK103(pe)003:404: yul lnga dbang po lnga kha dog lnga phyogs lnga rigs shes //
NK103(pe)003:405: de dag kun kyang lhag par rigs lnga dang 'brel pas de las 'da' bar daka'o //
NK103(pe)003:406: bsrung ba'i thabs dang skyon dang yon tan dang bya ba'i rjes bzhin du gnas so //
NK103(pe)003:407: rnal 'byor nang gi rtags lta spyod la sogs pa btab pas //
NK103(pe)003:408: dam tshig ces su rjod pa'i sgra de yang //
NK103(pe)003:409: sems nyid yin lugs kyi don la sgra zhugs pa yin ste //
NK103(pe)003:410: bsrung bya'i ngo bo rtsa ba lnga dang 'og ma
NK103(pe)003:411: dang thun mong bdag don dang gzhan don dang thun
NK103(pe)003:412: mong min ba nyer lnga ste yan lag gnyis /
NK103(pe)003:413: rtsa ba mnyam pa chen por bsrung sdom thams cad mdo 'brel bar gnas so //
NK103(pe)003:414: snang stong gnyis su med pa'i rang byung gi ye shes ni dam pa'i don //
NK103(pe)003:415: yin la rtogs te de'i ngang la gnas 1pa'i dang mi gnas pa'i skyon 1yon 1tan 11las //
NK103(pe)003:416: rnam 1par rtog pa 1dang rang 1gi rgyud 0duhkhasa sreg 10 pas na //
NK103(pe)003:417: dam tshig ces ni ngag tu rjod pa yin no //
NK103(pe)003:418: spyir dam tshig ni bsrung bar bya ba'i don dang 'gal bas na //
NK103(pe)003:419: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bya ba min cing rang gzhan gyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i las rnams la //
NK103(pe)003:420: rnal 'byor chen pos sgo gsum bsdam mo //
NK103(pe)003:421: ma h+aa khyad par gyi dam tshig rtsa ba lnga dang ni //
NK103(pe)003:422: yan lag bcu tshan gnyis la nyi shu rtsa lnga rnams la //
NK103(pe)003:423: bla ma lnga sgo gsum gyis bkur zhing bskyed rdzogs
NK103(pe)003:424: gnyis la zhugs pa'i mched grogs la gdung ba gnyis
NK103(pe)003:425: ni // sku yi dam tshig la gnas pa yin no //
NK103(pe)003:426: yi dam lha yi phyag rgya bzhi dam tshig las
NK103(pe)003:427: chos sku snying por rtsa ba bskyed pa las kyi
NK103(pe)003:429: pa rgyun mi gcad pa ni /
NK103(pe)003:430: gsung gi dam tshig lha sgrub pa yin no //
NK103(pe)003:431: bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems mi spang
NK103(pe)003:432: ba dang gsang bcu snod min la sba ba gnyis
NK103(pe)003:433: ni / thugs kyi dam tshig bsrung ba'o //
NK103(pe)003:434: byang sems dang pad+ma rak+ta dang //
NK103(pe)003:435: dri chen dang dri chu dang mam sa dang lnga dang du blang ste cis na //
NK103(pe)003:438: thun mong gi dgos pa lnga grub pa yin 0dang chos nyid rang gi rang bzhin /
NK103(pe)003:442: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang nga rgyal dang phrag dog dang rmongs pa gti mug rnams su //
NK103(pe)003:443: rang rig pa nyid rang shar ba'i phyir don la spang bya med pas mi spang ba lnga'o //
NK103(pe)003:444: sta na sgrol ba dang g+ha na sbyor ba ma byin len pa dang brdzun dang //
NK103(pe)003:445: ngag barlanga po'i tshig dang lnga don bzhir 'gyur na gzhung bzhin du spyad par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:446: phung po 1lnga 'byung ba 2lnga rnam shes 3lnga dbang 4po lnga //
NK103(pe)003:447: yul 5lnga phyogs 6dang 7kha dog 'das pa sogs bsdu /
NK103(pe)003:450: rang rgyud pa las khyad par du 'phags pa rigs la sogs par shes par bya ba lnga'o //
NK103(pe)003:452: nor bu'i 1pad+ma'i 1 las 1kyi rigs 11111lnga bsgrub par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:453: khyad par gyi dam tshig de dag dgongs pa dang
NK103(pe)003:454: spyod pa la gnas pa dang de'i ngang du shing
NK103(pe)003:455: rdzogs pa'o // lhag pa'i dam tshig ni don rtogs
NK103(pe)003:456: pa'i ngang la rgyun du spyod sgom mi 'bral bar
NK103(pe)003:457: rdzogs pa'o // gnas pa'o // de dag bsrung ba'i
NK103(pe)003:458: thabs ni grangs kyi rjes su mthun par spyi dang
NK103(pe)003:460: so so nyams pa'i chad pa nyes pa blo la bzhag ste //
NK103(pe)003:461: rtogs pa'i kha 'byams tsam las gdeng med pa'i bar du //
NK103(pe)003:462: yan lag phra mo'i phra mo'ang nying lag bsgrims la dran pa dag shes bzhin gyis bsrung ngo //
NK103(pe)003:463: dam tshig la mi gnas pa'i sngags pa de //
NK103(pe)003:464: na rag dmyal ba rdo rje'i las thar pa'i dus med pas gtan gzhi ste //
NK103(pe)003:465: rtogs pa don spyi yis dam nyams de mi skyob //
NK103(pe)003:466: sems 'dzin ting nge gnas pas duhkha chu bo lon min te mi log go //
NK103(pe)003:467: bsrungs pa'i yon tan tshad med pa rgyal bas kyang brjod par dka' ste //
NK103(pe)003:468: dkar po'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba shes sgrub kyi don gyi bcud //
NK103(pe)003:469: las brtsams so tsam gyi gzhi mar gnas //
NK103(pe)003:470: mchog thun mong gi dgos pa thams cad 'byung zhing ldan pas phun sum tshogs zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:471: lhag par shin tu rnal mar 'byor //
NK103(pe)003:472: bdag gzhan gnyis ka chos kyi don bzhir sngar bstan
NK103(pe)003:473: pa lam 'bras kyi rtsa ba rnams grangs su btab
NK103(pe)003:474: la // tshul bzhin du bden nges par dang du blang //
NK103(pe)003:475: phra mo'i phra mo yan chad bsdam pa la bsrung //
NK103(pe)003:476: rtsol bas ma btsal bar 'gro ba'i don byed pa la //
NK103(pe)003:477: 'dul byed kun kyang gdul bya kun gyi phyogs 'dzin las grol bar 'dul ba'o //
NK103(pe)003:478: rtsol bral rig pa'i dam tshig ni //
NK103(pe)003:479: gcig ces pa dang 'di zhes pa'i grangs su btab par //
NK103(pe)003:480: don gnas pa min la gnas skabs su grangs la //
NK103(pe)003:481: dgos pa yod pas bsrung bya med pa la phyogs 'dzin phyal ba dang //
NK103(pe)003:482: tha dad du dbyer med gcig pu ma btsal bar lhun grub rnam pa bzhi'o //
NK103(pe)003:483: spang blang gi phyogs dang grangs kyis btab nas bsrung bar bya ba dang //
NK103(pe)003:484: bral bas med pa'i dam tshig yin no //
NK103(pe)003:485: don phyogs med pa yin min dang yod med dang bden brdzun gyi //
NK103(pe)003:486: 'dzin pa dang ye nas bral bas phyal ba'i dam tshig yin no //
NK103(pe)003:487: thig le nyag gcig la 'khor 1'das 1dang bdag gzhan dang bzang 1 ngan 1du //
NK103(pe)003:488: dbyer med pas gcig pu'i dam tshig yin no //
NK103(pe)003:489: rang mtshan rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas nyams pa las grol ba yin pas //
NK103(pe)003:490: rtsol bas btsal du med yon tan lhun rdzogs su ye nas grub pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:491: 'dul sdom dam tshig gsum gyi khyad par sngar bstan pa las gzhan yang mdor bsdu na //
NK103(pe)003:492: dge ba dang sdig pa'i las dngos gzhi gtso bo'i khyad par la gtso bor bstan cing //
NK103(pe)003:493: sems can gzhan la gnod pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa kun tu spangs nas //
NK103(pe)003:494: spang bya brgyad lnga la sogs pa tha dad spangs pas rnam smin so so thar pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:495: rang gi don don du bya ba'i gtso bo ru byed pas rang gi sgo gsum 'dul //
NK103(pe)003:496: sngon gyi 'phags pa rjes su slob pa'i dgra bcom pa'i rjes su slob pa ni //
NK103(pe)003:497: so sor thar pa'i rigs bdun nam brgyad 'dul ba'i gzhung yin no //
NK103(pe)003:498: duh kha dang bral bar 'dod pa'i snying rje dngos chen po gtso bor bstan cing //
NK103(pe)003:499: sems can la gnod pa spangs nas de'i steng du gzhan la phan pa rgya chen po sgrub //
NK103(pe)003:500: 'bras bu byang chub dang sems can gzhan gyi don du sdom pa'o //
NK103(pe)003:501: don du gzhan don gtso ru byed cing phan sems la brtson //
NK103(pe)003:502: rjes su sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK103(pe)003:503: 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i rjes su slob pa ni
NK103(pe)003:504: // byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yin no //
NK103(pe)003:505: rang gi sgo dngos gzhi gsum lha'i k+aa b+aa tsi rdo rje dbyer med gtso bo ru bstan //
NK103(pe)003:506: gnod spangs phan pa sgrub pa las //
NK103(pe)003:507: sngon byung rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ltar rjes 'jug gang zag kyang nyams su len //
NK103(pe)003:508: don rtogs pa'i ngang la gnas pas bsrung bya thams cad rdzogs //
NK103(pe)003:509: don du bdag gzhan gnyi ga chos kyi don rnams //
NK103(pe)003:510: grub par bya ba'i don ched du rtogs pa'i don la blo gnas //
NK103(pe)003:511: rjes su rgyal ba nyid kyi rjes su mngon byang lnga dang ting nge gsum gyis slob pa ni //
NK103(pe)003:512: rig pa 'dzin pa gsang sngags pa'i dam tshig yin no //
NK103(pe)003:513: gnas lugs byang chub kyi sems lhun gyis gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)003:514: bde chen las mi 'da' bas dam pa'i ngang du
NK103(pe)003:515: // rtsol ba dang bral bar ye nas gnas pa de la nyams pa yi //
NK103(pe)003:516: 'jigs dogs gdod ma nas mi gnas te //
NK103(pe)003:517: ka nas dag pa la che ba'i yon tan thams
NK103(pe)003:518: cad lhun grub tu gnas pa ni gdeng 0yin no
NK103(pe)003:519: // nyams dogs med pa des 0na bsrung bar bya ba'i phyogs ris dang rnam grangs //
NK103(pe)003:520: rnam par dbye ba dang bzang ngan dang //
NK103(pe)003:521: bsrung mtshams su bzung ba rnams bsrung med kyi dam tshig la mi gnas pas bde ba che //
NK103(pe)003:522: bsrung bya srung byed kyi rtsol ba dang bral bar
NK103(pe)003:523: nges pa'i srog gis bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig
NK103(pe)003:524: la gnas so // bsrung brtsol med pa de yi ngang la dus rtag tu gnas na //
NK103(pe)003:525: 'dul sdom dam tshig thun mong ba bsrung mtshams can gyi yon tan rnams 'di'i cha la rdzogs te //
NK103(pe)003:526: nor bu rin chen gyi yon tan gyi zhor la nor bu phran bu rnams 'byung ba ltar ro //
NK103(pe)003:527: 'og ma ba las khyad par dus gyur pa'i yon
NK103(pe)003:528: tan ni bde ba chen po lhun grub gyis gnas
NK103(pe)003:530: srid gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang theg brgyad rtsol ba'i nad las ye nas grol bas so //
NK103(pe)003:531: don bzhi po kun rtsol bas ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub //
NK103(pe)003:532: thugs rje phyogs dang ris mi mnga' bar 'khor 'das kun la tu snyoms par khyab pas //
NK103(pe)003:533: rtsol bral gyi mdzad pa rgyun ma chad par 'khor 'das thams cad bde chen du grol ba'o //
NK103(pe)003:534: thun mong khyad par yon tan de las bzlog pa'i skyon yang de'i rjes su mthun te //
NK103(pe)003:535: rtsol med kyi theg pa 'di dang bral te mi
NK103(pe)003:536: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni snying po med pas
NK103(pe)003:537: sbun pa pa // rtsol bcas kyi theg pa la ji ltar 'bad rtsol dang brtson 'grus byas kyang //
NK103(pe)003:538: skye 'jig dang bcas pas 'khor ba'i 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur te //
NK103(pe)003:539: rang rang gi gshis kyi yin lugs gnad du ma song ste mthar ma phyin pas //
NK103(pe)003:540: lam gyi rgyu rkyen 'dus te byas pa'i 'bras bu
NK103(pe)003:541: slar 'jig pas 'bras bu mthar thug pa med pas
NK103(pe)003:542: // lam gyi rtsol bas ngal cing thang chad pa'i sdug bsngal yod la //
NK103(pe)003:543: rtsol med lhun gnas bde chen gyi snying po'i srog dang bral lo //
NK103(pe)003:544: skyon de la nges par bsrung ba'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)003:545: 'og ma pa ltar grangs su btab pa dang bsrung
NK103(pe)003:546: bya srung byed kyi rtsol bas bsrung ba'i thabs 'dir
NK103(pe)003:547: min te // bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs pa thob pa'i ngang du dran pas de'i so ma shor //
NK103(pe)003:548: bar byas te drin gyis gang rtogs na mtshon pa'i
NK103(pe)003:549: brda dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid shes pa gsum
NK103(pe)003:550: rang sar grol bar shar ba ni //
NK103(pe)003:551: yin lugs kyi don rtogs pa de'i so ma 'das pa tsam du dran pas gzhag go //
NK103(pe)003:552: bden pa'i gshis nges par rtogs pa'i ngang du gnas pa nar son na //
NK103(pe)003:553: 'khrul pa'i snang ba dang 'dzin pa bzlog pa'am spangs pa min te //
NK103(pe)003:554: mi mthun pa shes pa gsum po nyid gnyen por rtogs goms su rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)003:555: dgra min te rang tang la zon chas mi dgos so //
NK103(pe)003:556: rang bzhin 1nges med mtshan nyid 2rang rig rnam par byin 3rlabs can //
NK103(pe)003:557: yid kyi rnam 1rtog dang nyon yid gzung 2'dzin dang sgo lnga'i mtshan 3ma nyid //
NK103(pe)003:558: chos 1 sku dang longs 2spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul 3par'i sku ru rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)003:559: re dogs kyi ma btsal bar lhug par gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:560: bsrung thabs de la bsrung bya srung byed kyi rtsol ba dang phyogs ris dang //
NK103(pe)003:561: dbye bsal tha dad du 'gyur ba med pas //
NK103(pe)003:562: lhun gyis gnas pa rtogs pa'i dang nyid du //
NK103(pe)003:563: sgom bya btsal med par rang lugs su gnas par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:564: btsal med du gnas pa de las 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'ang de'i ngang du rdzogs //
NK103(pe)003:565: thun mong gi yon tan yan lag rnam par dbye ba'i skabs su sngar yongs su rdzogs la //
NK103(pe)003:566: khyad par gyi yon tan grangs kyi mtha' yi brjod pa las 'das pas //
NK103(pe)003:567: gzhung 'dir ni spros pa gzhag par bya'o //
NK103(pe)003:570: snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab pa'i 'gro ba'i rgyu da ni //
NK103(pe)003:571: las kyi srin po lta bur dgrol bar dka' //
NK103(pe)003:572: bden pas kyang mi 'dul rang gi 'dod pa'i phyogs su blo gtod kyang //
NK103(pe)003:573: rang dang rigs mthun pa'i rdzogs chen gyi skal ba
NK103(pe)003:574: dang ldan pa 'ga' tsam la phan pa'i don du
NK103(pe)003:575: gdams pa'o // phyis 'gro ba'i bde sdug mi dran par tshe 'dir gang phan pa 'dod //
NK103(pe)003:576: 'jig rten 'di'i don la gnas pa rnams la nams kyang thugs rje'i dpyang thag chad pa //
NK103(pe)003:577: de la yang dkar nag gi las kyi 'bras bu
NK103(pe)003:578: bde sdug 'byung ba bden pa'i mthu mi bslu ba'i
NK103(pe)003:579: // gleng gzhi mdo rgyud nas gsungs pa brjod de nges pa'i don la drang ba'i rigs yin //
NK103(pe)003:580: mi lus rin chen thob nas mi lus des kyang rin chen de ka sgrub pa //
NK103(pe)003:581: mi lus dgos dang yang dgos thams cad mkhyen pa'i thabs mi shes pas don la rmongs pa de //
NK103(pe)003:582: bdag gzhan gyi don sku gnyis bsgrub par sems bskyed pa'i mthu yis de drang par rigs so //
NK103(pe)003:583: 'bras bu ye nas lhun gyis grub par gnas la
NK103(pe)003:584: sems nyid rgyu tsam rkyen tshogs gnyis dang sa lam
NK103(pe)003:586: bskal pa grangs med gsum du lam la sbyangs ba'i sems kyis go cha gyon //
NK103(pe)003:587: ye nas gnas pa'i byin brlabs dang 'gag med kyi mthu las bskal ba'i skyes bu de //
NK103(pe)003:588: sa bcu la gnas pa las grol bas longs sku'i brda dgongs dang byin rlabs kyi //
NK103(pe)003:589: nus pa'i mthu yis dbang bskur drang ba'i rigs yin no //
NK103(pe)003:590: byin rlabs can gyi bder gshegs de bdag nyid kyi ngang la gnas pa de las bskal nas //
NK103(pe)003:591: phyi rol 'og min gyi gnas na bde gshegs pa //
NK103(pe)003:592: kri ya rje u pa ya dpon yo ga grogs
NK103(pe)003:593: mchog gi tshul du gnas pa la dngos grub thob
NK103(pe)003:594: tu re ma thob tu dogs ba can de //
NK103(pe)003:595: lha dang dngos grub rang la rdzogs pa'i ngang du phyi rgyud pa de drang rigs yin no //
NK103(pe)003:596: 'bras bu rang la lhun grub tu rdzogs par ston pa'i rgyal ba'i gsung 'chang kyang ma h+aa /
NK103(pe)003:597: rtsol sgrub dang a nu rgyu 'bras la //
NK103(pe)003:598: re thag ma chod gnyis med kyi phyogs su lta zhing de la'i nges par 'dzin pa can //
NK103(pe)003:599: rtsol med kyi don las 'gal ba la gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu don gyi mthu can //
NK103(pe)003:600: smin pa de lhun gyis gnas pa la rtsol sgrub
NK103(pe)003:601: med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngang du drang ba'i
NK103(pe)003:602: rigs yin no // bde chen gsung gis don spyir gnas shing 'dun pa byed pa'i //
NK103(pe)003:603: kha 'byams rang mtshan rtogs pa'i don las bskal ba'i rang bdud can //
NK103(pe)003:604: phral bde gting snyam tshig gi sgron ma can la //
NK103(pe)003:605: snyan brgyud kyi gdams pas rang gi mtshan nyid shar bar drang ba'i rigs yin no //
NK103(pe)003:606: lta kham ni don spyi yi rnam pa rtsam gyi gdeng las rang mtshan rtogs /
NK103(pe)003:607: nyes ltung med pa'i khungs phyung nas //
NK103(pe)003:608: dam tshig la mi gnas par rtsing chos dang nga rgyal can //
NK103(pe)003:609: bdag la bstod grogs la skur pa 'debs ba'i tshig gi mtshon cha can //
NK103(pe)003:610: dam tshig gcan 'phrang dang gal mdo dang g.yang sa ngan song bstan pas drang ba'i rigs yin no //
NK103(pe)003:611: bod pa kye ma dam pa skyes bu chen po dal 'byor gyi lus rnyed nas //
NK103(pe)003:612: dus dang gnas kyis ma bskal las smon gyi 'brel
NK103(pe)003:613: pa bzang bas snying po'i don ston pa'i bla ma
NK103(pe)003:614: dang mjal // sngar blo sbyangs sam rang gi ngo
NK103(pe)003:615: bos shes par bya ba'i rgyud kyi don spyi'i rnam
NK103(pe)003:616: dang mjal // par chod nas // 'jig rten 'di'i
NK103(pe)003:617: bya byed kyi las rnams bzhag ste bla ma dam
NK103(pe)003:618: pa'i rjes su 'brangs te bcad nas //
NK103(pe)003:619: tshe 'di'i dgos pa khe grags 'ga' tsam gyi phyir snying po'i don la gnas pa spangs nas //
NK103(pe)003:620: don la gnas pa'i skyes chen gzhan la sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs dpyas bas //
NK103(pe)003:621: rnam smin gyi 'bras bu rdo rje'i khab tu gshegs dgos pa de ya mtshan che //
NK103(pe)003:622: de skad gzhan la ma gleng bar rang la rang gis she gcad do //
NK103(pe)003:623: de ltar du gzhan btang snyoms su mi gzhag par
NK103(pe)003:624: gzhan gyi blo nus tshad du 'og nas gong du
NK103(pe)003:625: drang ngo // cis nas kyang rang gi rgyud dregs pa'i mtshon rno na //
NK103(pe)003:626: dus re zhig bdag gi gdul bya ma yin pas phyis 'dren pa'i smon lam btab la //
NK103(pe)003:627: gcan gzan rgyal po ser ge'i tshul du sdar tshul blang ste gcig pur bsdad //
NK103(pe)003:628: mi yi rgyal po rnams seng ge bdag gi thugs rje'i lcags kyus gzung ngo //
NK103(pe)003:629: phan gnod byas pa'i lan glan gnod pa la ngan
NK103(pe)003:630: par smras pas slob dpon dga' rab bdag dga' bar
NK103(pe)003:631: ga la rigs te mi mnyes so //
NK103(pe)003:632: tshe sngar gyi las dam pas snying po'i rten bzang po dal 'byor blangs //
NK103(pe)003:633: smon lam btab pa'i gnas mthu che ba bla ma dam pa dang phrad //
NK103(pe)003:634: rigs dang rgyu dag pas snying po rnal ma'i don rdzogs //
NK103(pe)003:635: snod kyi skyon bzhi dang bral bas rtogs pa shar goms pa gnas 'bras bu smin //
NK103(pe)003:636: rtogs pa'i shes rab dang gzhan phan gyi thugs rje gnyis rab tu ldan pas //
NK103(pe)003:637: rang grol bar byed pa'i nus mthu chen ye nas grol ba'i dpal //
NK103(pe)003:639: rtsol bas ma btsal bar bde bas ma 'ongs pa nges par lung bstan pa bkod pa //
NK103(pe)003:640: de ni 'bras bu rin chen dam pa thob par gnas pa'i //
NK103(pe)003:641: rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin pas sras rje btsun chen po'o //
NK103(pe)003:642: lhun gyis gnas pa de 'khor 'das spyi'i dpa' kun
NK103(pe)003:643: tu bzang po don gyi lha ngo bo nyid kyi
NK103(pe)003:644: sku // skyes chen rang gis dbang bsgyur te mngon du byas pas chos skus bcad //
NK103(pe)003:645: rgyal po'i rgyan can longs sku smin pas sa la gnas pa'i dpal du rgyas //
NK103(pe)003:646: rnal mas 'dul ba'i dus drug la bab pa'i tshe
NK103(pe)003:647: sprul sku gsang bdag des yang sprul bdag bsgral te
NK103(pe)003:649: thugs rjes kun nas bslang ba'i 'bras bu sa lam kun gyi gzhi 'da' daka'i dam tshig don 'di //
NK103(pe)003:650: 'jam dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nyid kyi thugs
NK103(pe)003:651: kyi sras po bram ze snying po grub pas long
NK103(pe)003:652: la // a ti'i skal ldan rang dang rigs mthun
NK103(pe)003:653: 1pa'i gang zag rnams la dam tshig 'di bsgrags nas
NK103(pe)003:654: la // // de 1dag gis kyang 'dris par byas la sems la glan //
NK103(pe)003:655: 'di la nan tan gyis shin tu ma 'bad na //
NK103(pe)003:656: nges par don las 'khyal bar 'gyur bas las byas pa gang yang don med du 'gyur ro //
NK103(pe)003:657: 'di bkod pa'i bsod nams rigs can spyir smin nas //
NK103(pe)003:658: de dag kun kyang mi 'da' dam gnas kun grol shog /
NK103(pe)003:659: dam tshig rin po che de kho na nyid du chos thams cad nges pa zhes bya ba /
NK103(pe)003:660: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so////rgya
NK103(pe)003:661: gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ta dang
NK103(pe)003:662: / bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro
NK103(pe)003:663: tsa nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur
NK103(pe)003:664: cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
